mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hybrid_board(psnum, num, subject, content, bdtype, hitCount, ipaddr, reg_date, blind) VALUES (hybrid_board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{bdtype}, 0, #{ipaddr}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM HYBRID_BOARD hb JOIN MEMBER m ON hb.num = m.num
AND blind = 0

SELECT hb.psnum, m.num, m.id, nickname, subject, content, TO_CHAR(hb.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date, blind, hitCount FROM HYBRID_BOARD hb JOIN MEMBER m ON hb.num = m.num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT rpnum, COUNT(*) replyCount, ps_num FROM HYBRID_BOARD_REPLY
GROUP BY rpnum, ps_num ) c ON hb.psnum = c.ps_num
AND blind = 0
ORDER BY psnum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT hb.psnum, hb.num, nickname, subject, content, hitCount, hb.reg_date, blind FROM HYBRID_BOARD hb JOIN MEMBER m ON hb.num = m.num
WHERE hb.psnum = #{psnum} AND blind = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE HYBRID_BOARD SET hitCount = hitCount + 1 WHERE psnum = #{psnum}
